skills: Writing code in multiple programming languages including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, PHP, SQL, Java, C, C++, C#, Go, and Rust, with a focus on web development, automation, and systems programming.

SQL for database management, including querying data, designing databases and tables, and inserting data, ensuring effective data organization and retrieval.

Fabricated and prepared components for final products.
Assembled and packaged products in preparation for shipment.
Deconstructed medical charts in preparation for digital scanning.
